tr.td: W&J wins toss and receives opening kickoff
Cody McClelland kickoff 42 yards to the W&J28, DeAndre Simmons return 27 yards to the THI45 (Julian McLean).
Matt Bliss pass complete to Hunter Creel for 17 yards to the THI28, 1ST DOWN W&J.
Matt Bliss pass incomplete to Max Creighan.
Tim McNerney rush for loss of 1 yard to the THI29 (Tim Taylor;Tom Thorpe).
Matt Bliss pass incomplete to Max Creighan (M. Hainesworth).
